The exciting adventure begins when Yi and his friends manage to recover, however, their journey will not be easy because Burnish (Eddie Izzard), a wealthy man who has ever tried Everest. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ap0NRJD-2ts //secret life of pets 2 Secret Life of Pets 2 2019 Chris Renaud The terrier Max tries to deal with major changes in his life. The owner is now married and has a baby, Liam. Max became so protective of the baby that it caused symptoms when he was agitated. While on a family vacation to the farm, Max and Duke mutters meet dog-resisting cows, wild foxes, and creepy turkeys, all of which only make Max more nervous. Fortunately, Max got help from an elderly dog ​​breeder, Rooster, who encouraged Max to get rid of the symptoms he had, find a leader in him, and no longer be too protective of Liam. Meanwhile, while the owner is away, the pomerania Gidget tries to secure Max\'s favorite toy from a cat-filled apartment, with the help of his cat friend Chloe, who is fond of playing with cat plants. And the crazy but funny rabbit Snowball increasingly fantasized that he had superpowers after his owner, Molly began to wear superhero pajamas on him. However, when the brave Shi tzu dog Daisy asks Snowball for a dangerous mission, Snowball must really muster up the courage to become a hero he can only imagine. Can Max, Snowball, Gidget, and others find the courage in themselves to fight their biggest fear? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EUZpVWepAQw //The Lion King The Lion King 2019 Jon Favreu Simba had to run away and save herself from the trap of her uncle, Scar, who was secretly eyeing her father\'s throne.
